scripts.build-auth: npm run test && node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t ejsify index.js -o ../js/app.js
scripts.build-menu: npm run test && node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t ejsify sysMenu/index.js -o ../js/sys_menu_app.js
scripts.build-menu-app: npm run test && node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t ejsify menuManage/index.js -o ../js/menu_app.js
scripts.build-deploy: npm run test && node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t ejsify deploy/index.js -o ../js/deploy_app.js
scripts.build-appManage: npm run test && node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t ejsify appManage/index.js -o ../js/manage_app.js
scripts.build-flowControl: npm run test && node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t ejsify flowControl/index.js -o ../js/flowControl_app.js
scripts.build-deploy-tool: npm run test && node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t ejsify deployTool/index.js -o ../js/deployTool_app.js
scripts.build-command-set: npm run test && node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js -t ejsify commandSet/index.js -o ../js/commandSet_app.js
scripts.build-all: npm run build-auth && npm run build-deploy && npm run build-appManage && npm run build-flowControl && npm run build-menu && npm run build-menu-app &&  npm run build-deploy-tool && npm run build-command-set
